title: RP problem.
body:
Ok so for the past couple days i'v been getting the error message "error You have exceeded your maximum amount of attempts please wait 24 hours"
I mean it's been two days and it let me put 10 dollars on earlier i thought of yay it's fixed then i tried for 5 dollars boom hit with error again. I'v already sent a support ticket but i was wondering has anyone else experienced this and if it is a serious issue or not?

Regards,
Zoey

replies.body:
Hey TouhouZoey,

I haven't heard of that problem before. A good place to go look for help is our support site.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Hey there TouhouZoey,

I've never heard of this problem before so I'm not entirely sure of a solution. I'm sure a Rioter will address your ticket soon. But for now may I suggest seeing if you can get gifted RP from another account or try a different computer. 

Kind Regards,
lols =)
